mapper.insert: insert into user_addresses (user_id, address_detail, main_address, longitude, latitude, address) values (#{userId}, #{addressDetail}, #{mainAddress}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, ST_GeomFromText(#{address}))
mapper.update: update user_addresses set address_detail = #{addressDetail}, main_address = #{mainAddress}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, address = ST_GeomFromText(#{address}) where user_address_id = #{id}
